item.title: Roleplay Starters
item.description:
#FeraWorld
#FeraWorld
A list of Roleplay Starters, the character and if lewd or not.
NOTE
This is a Work In Progress Export from a Data View Query. So it will be edited over time to work with the links.
You can find the starters in the menu manually
Roleplays >> VERSE NAME >> Open Starters
These starters are NON Lewd and are all mixed-verse. I will make eventually sort them out into series.

item.title: Summary
item.description:
#FeraWorld #VoidApostasy #CitadelOfDarkness #TunnelsOfDespair #METRO #SciFiSetting #Net #LongWar
Welcome to my Wiki! I decided that if I have to pay for ALL this a year, I will add all my stuff to here, not just my Fera World!
There are a wide selection of books available for purchase either through the main website: http://lewisstockton.com/ or your favourite retailers! You can even find them on your Amazon store of choice!
You can find a list of the books here:
List of Books
I also have Fanfictions which are available on most websites, but will be available to read here too:
List of Fanfictions
Each 'Verse has its own section which you can access. You can use the search bar to find it via these tags or in the explorer at the side.
WORLDS/VERSES Tags
Fera - #FeraWorld
Void Apostasy #VoidApostasy
Citadel Of Darkness #CitadelOfDarkness
Tunnels of Despair #TunnelsOfDespair
Metro Of Ashes - #METRO
Unnamed_Sci Fi_Setting - #SciFiSetting
.Net #Net
The Long War #LongWar
<< WARNING >>
Content on this site will be considered Not Safe For Work, there are depictions of nudity and violent actions, this world is not a safe world, it's a real world; fucked up shit happens.
Change Log
If you are here to Roleplay, you can find starters linked below or by going to the section listed on the side bar:
Roleplay Starters
Welcome to the World of Fera, the custom fantasy world set up by Lewis Stockton for the use of his books, novels, table top roleplay games and in-universe roleplays!
Please see below for links leading to various sections.
For a quick Fera World Basic Information page, please use the link <<

Timeline
Fera World Character List
Welcome to the Void Apostasy universe! A science fiction universe set thousands of years in the future where a tyrannical human Empire attempts to keep itself from falling apart, beset by aliens, mutants and heretics.
Welcome to the section dedicated to the novel Citadel of Darkness (Novel). A dark world where a writer must create his own way out of Limbo.
Citadel of Darkness Character List
Faithless is a contemporary, character-driven drama that follows the raw, spiraling life of a teenage girl named Faith; angry, aimless, and already burned out before adulthood. Set in a grim, decaying world of broken homes and forgotten streets, the series explores the inner life of a girl who’s been failed by everything meant to protect her: family, school, society, and even herself.
Faith is volatile. Sharp-tongued. Self-destructive. She moves through her world like a fuse already lit — looking for something worth burning down. Each chapter drags her deeper into violence, co-dependence, and fleeting highs as she pushes against the hollow systems around her and the growing emptiness within.
Themes include:
Faith and the lack of it – not religious, but personal: trust, love, stability, future.
Survival without guidance – what happens when no one is coming to save you.
Anger as identity – how pain curdles into performance.
Beauty in the breakdown – fleeting moments of tenderness in lives full of ash.
The tone is stark, intimate, and unfiltered. There are no heroes. No redemption arcs. Just the truth as she sees it, told in scars, smirks, and cigarette smoke.
The title Faithless is both her name and her condition — a girl with no faith left in anything, least of all herself.
Faithless Character List
Welcome to the World of "Metro of Ashes." A hundred or so years after a catastrophic war, the world is a wasteland of frozen radioactive shit., Humanity survives in bunkers and underground facilities; few alive remember what happened or what caused their extinction.
Some say nuclear war, some say extra terrestrial beings.
What people do know is they are safer underground in the Ashes of the Old World.

The list includes "Playable" and "NON Playable"
